commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Ahh. The air in the forest really is different. It's so fresh. I feel more revitalized with every breath I take.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The sunlight coming through the trees is beautiful. Not too bright, not too dark. Plus the sound of birds singing is so relaxing. *Yawn*

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Kanata, please try to stay awake until we get to the rest area. I know the trail is paved the entire way, but it's still dangerous to walk around willy-nilly.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hey, look at the bird on that branch. I wonder what kind it is.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I can look it up, zura. I brought a bird guide and some binoculars from my house! Let's see what we've got.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Doesn't all that stuff make your bag really heavy?!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: The weight of knowledge is a burden worth carrying, zura! I'll find the bird Eli saw. First I'll need to look at it through my binoculars, zura. Eli, where is it?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It's over... Huh? Aww, it's gone.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: The sunlight's getting fainter. We must be pretty deep in the forest now. Is everyone all right? Everyone keeping up?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: What a silly question. Do you think I, the great Yohane, would be bested by such a simple mountain path?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yoshiko, you're more energetic now than when we started the hike.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Don't call me Yoshiko! Hmph, whatever. Mountains are the realm of gods and demons. My power grows with every step I take!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I have no idea what you're talking about.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I think the stark difference between the darkness of the forest and daily life has her excited, zura.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Whoa!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Huh? E-Eli, what is it?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I-I s-saw something...moving in that bush there. Hanamaru, please go see what it is!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: O-Okay, zura. Umm, there's nothing here.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Really?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: EEEEEEEK!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Eli?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Geez! That scared me!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What happened?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Heeeeeeelp!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Eli! Wait, where are you going?! Eli!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Sh-She's gone, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: She's so fast... No, forget that! She went completely off the hiking trail!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We should probably, uhh, go after her?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yes. We can't leave her. Come on everyone, let's go!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru, Yoshiko, Kanata
commands.line: Yeah!
